bar-soriano.name: Bar Soriano
bar-soriano.description: One of the most emblematic taverns on Laurel Street, famous for its traditional pinchos and authentic atmosphere.
bar-soriano.review: One of the most emblematic taverns on Laurel Street, famous for its traditional pinchos and authentic atmosphere.

bar-laurel-2.name: Bar Blanco y Negro
bar-laurel-2.description: Modern tavern with a careful selection of creative pinchos and regional wines.
bar-laurel-2.review: Modern tavern with a careful selection of creative pinchos and regional wines.

bar-laurel-3.name: Taberna Herrerías
bar-laurel-3.description: Traditional tavern with more than 50 years of history, specialized in classic Riojan pinchos.
bar-laurel-3.review: Traditional tavern with more than 50 years of history, specialized in classic Riojan pinchos.

bar-laurel-4.name: Bar La Taberna
bar-laurel-4.description: Modern tavern with a selection of fusion pinchos and international wines.
bar-laurel-4.review: Modern tavern with a selection of fusion pinchos and international wines.

bar-laurel-5.name: Bar El Rincón
bar-laurel-5.description: Small family bar with homemade pinchos and cozy atmosphere.
bar-laurel-5.review: Small family bar with homemade pinchos and cozy atmosphere.

bar-laurel-6.name: Bar Los Pimientos
bar-laurel-6.description: Specialist in piquillo peppers and other products from the Riojan garden.
bar-laurel-6.review: Specialist in piquillo peppers and other products from the Riojan garden.

bar-laurel-7.name: Bar La Tortilla
bar-laurel-7.description: Specialist in tortillas and other traditional Spanish dishes.
bar-laurel-7.review: Specialist in tortillas and other traditional Spanish dishes.
